2 cups white sugar,1 cup packed brown sugar,1 cup vegetable oil or melted butter,4 eggs,1 (15 ounce) can pumpkin puree,3 ½ cups all-purpose flour,2 teaspoons baking soda,2 teaspoons salt,½ teaspoon ground cloves,1 ½ teaspoons ground cinnamon,1 teaspoon ground allspice,1 teaspoon ground nutmeg,⅔ cup water,1 cup flaked coconut,½ cup chopped walnuts,,
